sentences.en: As they work, they sing unaccompanied by musical instruments.
sentences.cn: 他们边工作 、 边唱歌,不需要任何乐器伴奏.
巴哈的无伴奏大提琴奏呜曲.

sentences.en: Beauty , unaccompanied by virtue , is as a flower without perfume.
Beauty , unaccompanied by virtue, is as a flower without perfumed.
sentences.cn: 美而无德, 好似花儿艳而无香.

sentences.en: Children unaccompanied by an adult will not be admitted.
sentences.cn: 儿童无成年人陪伴着不准入场.

sentences.en: For an encore, he sang an unaccompanied folk song.
sentences.cn: 应观众再唱一曲的要求, 他清唱了一首民歌.

sentences.en: He found himself nourishing the hope that Miss Bart might be unaccompanied.
sentences.cn: 他正热切期望巴特小姐能独自前来.

sentences.en: He played works for unaccompanied violin.
sentences.cn: 他演奏了不需伴奏的小提琴乐曲.

sentences.en: It is estimated that every year 50 unaccompanied children arrive in Britain.
sentences.cn: 据估计，每年有50名儿童独自来到英国。

sentences.en: It's very expensive. Can I send one of these by unaccompanied baggage?
sentences.cn: 太贵了, 我可以将一件以不随机行李方式运送 吗 ?

sentences.en: My son needs to be checked in as an unaccompanied minor.
sentences.cn: 我的儿子需办理无成人陪伴儿童.
无大人带领的儿童不许进入。

sentences.en: Unaccompanied baggage must be checked in at the airport 24 hours in advance.
sentences.cn: 非随身载运的托运行李必须提前24小时在机场办理托运手续.

sentences.en: Unaccompanied child 2 - 11 accepted for travel at fares governed by this rule.
sentences.cn: 此规定及相关运价不适用于2-11岁无成人陪伴儿童.

sentences.en: Unaccompanied children are not allowed on the premises.
sentences.cn: 儿童无成人陪伴不得入内。

sentences.en: Would you like to send the big box as unaccompanied baggage?
sentences.cn: 您愿意把这个大箱子作为无人伴随行李托运 吗 ?

words.tran_cn: 无伴奏的；无伴侣的；无伴随的

trans.tran_cn: 无人陪伴的，无人伴随的，无伴侣的，<音>无伴奏的
trans.tran_en: someone or something that is unaccompanied has no one with them
